NOTES: Core possessive marker; shows ownership/possession (“of / belonging to”)
Adds sense of “oneself / (one’s) own” or emphasis (เช่น ของตัวเอง = one’s own thing)
Stronger “self/own”; used for “my own / your own / their own”
Used to talk about someone’s name; possession pattern: ชื่อของ… (name of …)
Used to turn verbs/adjectives into nouns (e.g. ความสุข = happiness, ความเป็นเจ้าของ = ownership).
Root in เจ้าของ (owner). In this set, focus on the “owner” meaning related to possession.
Core verb for “to have” and “there is/are” (มีบ้าน = have a house; มีคน = there are people).
